item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 22, 2025 at 3:30 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Pen and Paper Exercises in Machine Learning (2022) (237 points | 26 comments)

11. Imbue (YC S17) Is Hiring Product Engineers ( | hide)

13. ‘Bluey’s World’: How a Cute Aussie Puppy Became a Juggernaut (183 points | 189 comments)

29. MySQL transactions per second vs. fsyncs per second (2020) (48 points | 26 comments)
